page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Mosstowie Primary School pupils from primaries four,five,six and seven with ages ranging from 9 years to 12 years of age produced the information for the Domesday Project,1986. There were 3 boys in P4,4 boys and 2 girls in P5,1 boy and 3 girls in P6 and 5 boys and 2 girls in P7,a total of 20 pupils working in separate groups. The pupils were apprehensive when introduced to the idea but were soon completely engrossed in the researching,interviewing and writing up of the material.Unfortunately the Scottish schools' summer term was not long enough to do full justice to the work required to complete the project in an area which had so much to offer.
